resources.string: A mixed rice dish with various seasoned vegetables, often topped with gochujang, and sometimes tofu or mushrooms.
Rice, spinach, carrots, zucchini, mushrooms, bean sprouts, gochujang, sesame oil, nori, tofu
Vegan, Lacto-vegetarian, Ovo-vegetarian, Lacto-ovo-vegetarian, Pollo-vegetarian, Pesco-vegetarian
Contains sesame, soy. Free from beef, pork, chicken, lamb, shellfish, crustaceans, dairy, peanuts, wheat, corn, gluten, mustard, celery, sulfites, lupin. It may contain eggs.
